sentences.english: The arid valleys of the Minjiang River is the worst ecotope in West China.
sentences.chinese: 岷江干旱河谷是我国西部生态环境最恶劣的地区之一。

sentences.english: The town lie at the end of the valley.
sentences.chinese: 这个镇坐落于河谷的尽头。

sentences.english: Where is the red river valley? It is on the left of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 红河谷在哪里？它在那个小山的左边。

sentences.english: Outside of Beaujolais this variety hasn't been very successful but it is cultivated in the Loire Valley and California.
sentences.chinese: 薄酒来区以外只有罗亚尔河谷与加州种植较为成功。

sentences.english: We pitched camp in a river valley.
Mango is well-known as the king among the tropical fruits. It is abundant along the Youjiang River Valley of Baise.
sentences.chinese: 芒果称为“热带果王”，百色右江河谷芒果资源丰富。

sentences.english: To the west of the mountains is San Joaquin Valley, the southern half of the Central Valley.
sentences.chinese: 西面的山岭是圣华金河谷，中央大峡谷的南半部分。

sentences.english: The red that lines the top of the image is plant-covered land in the Markarfljót river valley.
sentences.chinese: 图片顶部用红色划出的是植被覆盖的马卡弗特河谷。

sentences.english: Terraces are commonly developed in several rivers at the North Tianshan piedmont.
sentences.chinese: 北天山山前几条主要河流普遍发育河谷阶地。

sentences.english: The upper valley of the tiber .
Car Xining, all the way along the Valley Huang.
sentences.chinese: 车出西宁，一路沿湟水河谷前进。

sentences.english: Dalbergia sissoo can be adaptable in dry-hot valley areas.
sentences.chinese: 印度黄檀适于云南干热河谷地区的荒山造林。

sentences.english: The edge of the incised-valley lacked the sand-gravel bed of the river channel at the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 古河谷的边缘地带，往往缺失底部的河床相砂砾层。

sentences.english: We traveled to a plateau that had been deeply incised by streams.
sentences.chinese: 我们旅行到一处高原，高原被深深的河谷切断。

sentences.english: as dusk, riding home in a car, singing “Red River Valley.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳中一起唱着《红河谷》驱车回家。

definition: great valley/Grand Canyon of Colorado River
